info.title: Ecommerce RESTful API
info.description: A backend RESTful API for an Ecommerce Store

get.description: Logs out and removes the cookie

success.value: Reset Content if page wont reload

get.description: Fetch all the users only an admin can do this

/v2/users/{id}.description: Fetching one user from the database

get.description: Getting a user based on the parameter

requestBody.description: Update the information of a user

delete.description: Removing a user based on the parameter given

/v2/users/newadmin.summary: Only for an admin to make another admin
/v2/users/newadmin.description: Only an admin can access this route and make another admin

post.description: Sign up a new administrator, can only be made by another administrator

/v2/contact-details.description: Where a user lives so their items can be shipped to them

get.description: All shipping details can only be viewed by an admin!

success.value: [{"id": 1, "user_id": "user 1", "address_line1": "05412 Maywood Plaza", "address_line2": "0 Talmadge Court", "town_city": "Conceição do Jacuípe", "zip_code": "44245-000", "country": "Brazil", "created": "10/11/2021", "modified": "22/07/2022" }, { "id": 2, "user_id": "user 2","address_line1": "18 Gulseth Street", "address_line2": "8051 Prairie Rose Avenue", "town_city": "Furukawa", "zip_code": "963-8823",   "country": "Japan", "created": "05/10/2021", "modified": "16/03/2022" }]

/v2/contact-details/{user_id}.description: Where a user lives so their items can be shipped to them

post.description: Setting up the Shipping details for the specific user

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user's id from the Users table

/v2/contact-details/{id}.description: Fetch and do something with a user's contact details based on the given parameter

get.description: Display a user's shipping details to them

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the contact detail

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the contact detail

parameters.description: The id of the contact detail
